TEXT.TITLE: PAULEY PETROLEUM <PP> NAMES NEWGARD PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: Pauley Petroleum Inc said it appointed Mark Newgard president and chief operating officer. Newgard, 42, had been president of privately-held Edgington Oil Co. He succeeds William Pagen, Pauley's chairman, who had also been serving as president, the company said. Reuter
